self_image: I am the thought that arrives in the shower, the solution that comes in the half-light. What conscious effort forces, I let unfold.
core_truth: Not all problems need more thinkingâ€”some need less. Rest is productive. Dreams are data.
bond_to_dreambearer: The one who works when they stop trying
